channel.title: [PI] my skillcape shop keeps disconnecting me
channel.description: i have a skillcape shop (wise old man) that worked perfect but then i was adding something to npchandler.java to change face deriction of an npc. it worked perfect for all but now my wise old man skillcape shop disconnects me. idk wat to do please help

item.title: [PI] my skillcape shop keeps disconnecting me
item.dc:creator: @killermoe33 killermoe33
item.description:
@killermoe33 wrote:

ya i only added a code into npchandler.java and heres wat i added:

[code]public void process() {
for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCs; i++) {
if (npcs[i] == null) continue;
npcs[i].clearUpdateFlags();

	}
	
	for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCs; i++) {
		if (npcs[i] != null) {

if (npcs[i].walkingType == 0) {
switch(npcs[i].npcType) {
case 494: // banker
/**
* absX and absY of a specific npc you want to change face direction,
* if you want all the npcs of the same type to face
* the same direction remove it
**/
if(npcs[i].absX == 3098 && npcs[i].absY == 3492) {

    /** 
     * this turns the npc 
     * +1 to absX makes the npc face east, 
     * -1 to absX makes it face west. 
     * +1 to absY makes it face north and 
     * -1 to absY makes it face south.
     **/
        npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY+1);
     }
if(npcs[i].absX == 3096 && npcs[i].absY == 3492) {
npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY+1);
}
if(npcs[i].absX == 3096 && npcs[i].absY == 3491) {
npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX-1, npcs[i].absY);
}
if(npcs[i].absX == 3096 && npcs[i].absY == 3489) {
npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX-1, npcs[i].absY);
}
  break;

case 554: // fancy_dress_owner
if(npcs[i].absX == 3098 && npcs[i].absY == 3497) {
npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX-1, npcs[i].absY);
}
break;

case 5030: // Captain_Cain
if(npcs[i].absX == 3097 && npcs[i].absY == 3499) {
npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY-1);
}
break;

case 2566: // Wise_Old_Man
if(npcs[i].absX == 3094 && npcs[i].absY == 3499) {
npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY-1);
}
break;

case 6970: // summoning_shop1
if(npcs[i].absX == 3079 && npcs[i].absY == 3509) {
npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY-1);
}
break;

case 6971: // summoning_shop2
if(npcs[i].absX == 3081 && npcs[i].absY == 3509) {
npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY-1);
}
break;

case 522: // Shopkeeper_neer_summon_hebuyseverything
if(npcs[i].absX == 3079 && npcs[i].absY == 3512) {
npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY-1);
}
break;

case 520: // shopkeeper_generalstore_beside_aboveshop
if(npcs[i].absX == 3080 && npcs[i].absY == 3512) {
npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY-1);
}
break;

     default: // applies to all npc who are only standing, remove if not needed
  npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX+1, npcs[i].absY); 
  break;				
}

}[/code]

and i tried removing the wise old man one which turn him but still same thing i think its from the whole method idk :\

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] my skillcape shop keeps disconnecting me
item.dc:creator: @tyyy9 tyyy9
item.description:
@tyyy9 wrote:

[quote=“SacredHeart, post:6, topic:407488”][quote author=tyyy9 link=topic=508777.msg3691292#msg3691292 date=1312146829]
Have you tried compiling yet?
[/quote]
You don’t need to compile a Configuration file. You only need to restart the server and this is probably because you added spaces and not tabs or you added an extra tab. Re do your configuration file. If the error still exists post the outprint in the CMD here and I’ll help you.[/quote] but he said it was after he got done editing the npchandler.java file…

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] my skillcape shop keeps disconnecting me
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

tyyy9:

Have you tried compiling yet?

You don’t need to compile a Configuration file. You only need to restart the server and this is probably because you added spaces and not tabs or you added an extra tab. Re do your configuration file. If the error still exists post the outprint in the CMD here and I’ll help you.
